official_title: System for High Intensity EvaLuation During Radiation Therapy (SHIELD-RT): A Prospective Randomized Study of Machine Learning-directed Clinical Evaluations During Outpatient Cancer Radiation and Chemoradiation
inclusion_criteria:
â€¢ started outpatient radiation therapy with or without concurrent systemic therapy at Duke Cancer Center
Healthy volunteers allowed

exclusion_criteria:
* undergoing total body radiation therapy for hematopoetic stem cell transplantation
* undergoing therapy as inpatient
* treating physician who opted out of randomization
* completed radiation therapy prior to algorithm execution
